heroDescription: Buffalo, New York, is a vibrant city known for its rich history, diverse culture, and significant economic transformation.
landscapeDescription: Buffalo's economy is diversifying, with growth in healthcare, education, and technology sectors. The city is revitalizing its waterfront and urban areas, attracting new businesses.
uniqueNeeds: Buffalo requires enhanced economic diversification and infrastructure improvements to support its growing population.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Buffalo's manufacturing focus poses risks; diversify into tech and healthcare. Housing market stability is critical amid potential flooding and winter storms.

sections.title: Economic Growth

sections.title: Cost of Living

sections.title: Business Environment
